00052 {
00053         const double m1   =       4294967087.0;
00054         const double m2   =       4294944443.0;
00055         const double norm =       1.0 / (m1 + 1.0);
00056         const double a12  =       1403580.0;
00057         const double a13n =       810728.0;
00058         const double a21  =       527612.0;
00059         const double a23n =       1370589.0;
00060         const double two17 =      131072.0;
00061         const double two53 =      9007199254740992.0;
00062         const double fact =       5.9604644775390625e-8;     /* 1 / 2^24  */
00063         
00064         // The following are the transition matrices of the two MRG components
00065         // (in matrix form), raised to the powers -1, 1, 2^76, and 2^127, resp.
00066         
00067         const double InvA1[3][3] = {          // Inverse of A1p0
00068                { 184888585.0,   0.0,  1945170933.0 },
00069                {         1.0,   0.0,           0.0 },
00070                {         0.0,   1.0,           0.0 }
00071                };
00072         
00073         const double InvA2[3][3] = {          // Inverse of A2p0
00074                {      0.0,  360363334.0,  4225571728.0 },
00075                {      1.0,          0.0,           0.0 },
00076                {      0.0,          1.0,           0.0 }
00077                };
00078         
00079         const double A1p0[3][3] = {
00080                {       0.0,        1.0,       0.0 },
00081                {       0.0,        0.0,       1.0 },
00082                { -810728.0,  1403580.0,       0.0 }
00083                };
00084         
00085         const double A2p0[3][3] = {
00086                {        0.0,        1.0,       0.0 },
00087                {        0.0,        0.0,       1.0 },
00088                { -1370589.0,        0.0,  527612.0 }
00089                };
00090         
00091         const double A1p76[3][3] = {
00092                {      82758667.0, 1871391091.0, 4127413238.0 },
00093                {    3672831523.0,   69195019.0, 1871391091.0 },
00094                {    3672091415.0, 3528743235.0,   69195019.0 }
00095                };
00096         
00097         const double A2p76[3][3] = {
00098                {    1511326704.0, 3759209742.0, 1610795712.0 },
00099                {    4292754251.0, 1511326704.0, 3889917532.0 },
00100                {    3859662829.0, 4292754251.0, 3708466080.0 }
00101                };
00102         
00103         const double A1p127[3][3] = {
00104                {    2427906178.0, 3580155704.0,  949770784.0 },
00105                {     226153695.0, 1230515664.0, 3580155704.0 },
00106                {    1988835001.0,  986791581.0, 1230515664.0 }
00107                };
00108         
00109         const double A2p127[3][3] = {
00110                {    1464411153.0,  277697599.0, 1610723613.0 },
00111                {      32183930.0, 1464411153.0, 1022607788.0 },
00112                {    2824425944.0,   32183930.0, 2093834863.0 }
00113                };

00117         //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00118         // Return (a*s + c) MOD m; a, s, c and m must be < 2^35
00119         //
00120         double MultModM (double a, double s, double c, double m)
00121         {
00122             double v;
00123             long a1;
00124         
00125             v = a * s + c;
00126         
00127             if (v >= two53 || v <= -two53) {
00128                 a1 = static_cast<long> (a / two17);    a -= a1 * two17;
00129                 v  = a1 * s;
00130                 a1 = static_cast<long> (v / m);     v -= a1 * m;
00131                 v = v * two17 + a * s + c;
00132             }
00133         
00134             a1 = static_cast<long> (v / m);
00135             /* in case v < 0)*/
00136             if ((v -= a1 * m) < 0.0) return v += m;   else return v;
00137         }
00138         
00139         
00140         //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00141         // Compute the vector v = A*s MOD m. Assume that -m < s[i] < m.
00142         // Works also when v = s.
00143         //
00144         void MatVecModM (const double A[3][3], const double s[3], double v[3],
00145                          double m)
00146         {
00147             int i;
00148             double x[3];               // Necessary if v = s
00149         
00150             for (i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
00151                 x[i] = MultModM (A[i][0], s[0], 0.0, m);
00152                 x[i] = MultModM (A[i][1], s[1], x[i], m);
00153                 x[i] = MultModM (A[i][2], s[2], x[i], m);
00154             }
00155             for (i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00156                 v[i] = x[i];
00157         }
00158         
00159         
00160         //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00161         // Compute the matrix C = A*B MOD m. Assume that -m < s[i] < m.
00162         // Note: works also if A = C or B = C or A = B = C.
00163         //
00164         void MatMatModM (const double A[3][3], const double B[3][3],
00165                          double C[3][3], double m)
00166         {
00167             int i, j;
00168             double V[3], W[3][3];
00169         
00170             for (i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
00171                 for (j = 0; j < 3; ++j)
00172                     V[j] = B[j][i];
00173                 MatVecModM (A, V, V, m);
00174                 for (j = 0; j < 3; ++j)
00175                     W[j][i] = V[j];
00176             }
00177             for (i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00178                 for (j = 0; j < 3; ++j)
00179                     C[i][j] = W[i][j];
00180         }
00181         
00182         
00183         //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00184         // Compute the matrix B = (A^(2^e) Mod m);  works also if A = B. 
00185         //
00186         void MatTwoPowModM (const double A[3][3], double B[3][3], double m, long e)
00187         {
00188            int i, j;
00189         
00190            /* initialize: B = A */
00191            if (A != B) {
00192               for (i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00193                  for (j = 0; j < 3; ++j)
00194                     B[i][j] = A[i][j];
00195            }
00196            /* Compute B = A^(2^e) mod m */
00197            for (i = 0; i < e; i++)
00198               MatMatModM (B, B, B, m);
00199         }
00200         
00201         
00202         //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00203         // Compute the matrix B = (A^n Mod m);  works even if A = B.
00204         //
00205         void MatPowModM (const double A[3][3], double B[3][3], double m, long n)
00206         {
00207             int i, j;
00208             double W[3][3];
00209         
00210             /* initialize: W = A; B = I */
00211             for (i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00212                 for (j = 0; j < 3; ++j) {
00213                     W[i][j] = A[i][j];
00214                     B[i][j] = 0.0;
00215                 }
00216             for (j = 0; j < 3; ++j)
00217                 B[j][j] = 1.0;
00218         
00219             /* Compute B = A^n mod m using the binary decomposition of n */
00220             while (n > 0) {
00221                 if (n % 2) MatMatModM (W, B, B, m);
00222                 MatMatModM (W, W, W, m);
00223                 n /= 2;
00224             }
00225         }
00226         
00227         
00228         //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00229         // Check that the seeds are legitimate values. Returns 0 if legal seeds,
00230         // -1 otherwise.
00231         //
00232         int CheckSeed (const unsigned long seed[6])
00233         {
00234             int i;
00235         
00236             for (i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
00237                 if (seed[i] >= m1) {
00238                     cerr << "****************************************\n"
00239                          << "ERROR: Seed[" << i << "] >= 4294967087, Seed is not set."
00240                          << "\n****************************************\n\n";
00241                     return (-1);
00242                 }
00243             }
00244             for (i = 3; i < 6; ++i) {
00245                 if (seed[i] >= m2) {
00246                     cerr << "*****************************************\n"
00247                          << "ERROR: Seed[" << i << "] >= 4294944443, Seed is not set."
00248                          << "\n*****************************************\n\n";
00249                     return (-1);
00250                 }
00251             }
00252             if (seed[0] == 0 && seed[1] == 0 && seed[2] == 0) {
00253                  cerr << "****************************\n"
00254                       << "ERROR: First 3 seeds = 0.\n"
00255                       << "****************************\n\n";
00256                  return (-1);
00257             }
00258             if (seed[3] == 0 && seed[4] == 0 && seed[5] == 0) {
00259                  cerr << "****************************\n"
00260                       << "ERROR: Last 3 seeds = 0.\n"
00261                       << "****************************\n\n";
00262                  return (-1);
00263             }
00264         
00265             return 0;
00266         }
00267 
00268 } // end of anonymous namespace

00271 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00272 // Generate the next random number.
00273 //
00274 double RngStream::U01 ()
00275 {
00276     long k;
00277     double p1, p2, u;
00278 
00279     /* Component 1 */
00280     p1 = a12 * m_cg[1] - a13n * m_cg[0];
00281     k = static_cast<long> (p1 / m1);
00282     p1 -= k * m1;
00283     if (p1 < 0.0) p1 += m1;
00284     m_cg[0] = m_cg[1]; m_cg[1] = m_cg[2]; m_cg[2] = p1;
00285 
00286     /* Component 2 */
00287     p2 = a21 * m_cg[5] - a23n * m_cg[3];
00288     k = static_cast<long> (p2 / m2);
00289     p2 -= k * m2;
00290     if (p2 < 0.0) p2 += m2;
00291     m_cg[3] = m_cg[4]; m_cg[4] = m_cg[5]; m_cg[5] = p2;
00292 
00293     /* Combination */
00294     u = ((p1 > p2) ? (p1 - p2) * norm : (p1 - p2 + m1) * norm);
00295 
00296     return (m_anti == false) ? u : (1 - u);
00297 }
00298 
00299 
00300 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00301 // Generate the next random number with extended (53 bits) precision.
00302 //
00303 double RngStream::U01d ()
00304 {
00305     double u;
00306     u = U01();
00307     if (m_anti) {
00308         // Don't forget that U01() returns 1 - u in the antithetic case
00309         u += (U01() - 1.0) * fact;
00310         return (u < 0.0) ? u + 1.0 : u;
00311     } else {
00312         u += U01() * fact;
00313         return (u < 1.0) ? u : (u - 1.0);
00314     }
00315 }

00322 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00323 // The default seed of the package; will be the seed of the first
00324 // declared RngStream, unless SetPackageSeed is called.
00325 //
00326 double RngStream::sm_nextSeed[6] =
00327 {
00328    12345.0, 12345.0, 12345.0, 12345.0, 12345.0, 12345.0
00329 };
00330 
00331 
00332 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00333 // constructor
00334 //
00335 RngStream::RngStream ( const unsigned long arraySize )
00336 : RandomDeviate(arraySize)
00337 {
00338    m_anti = false;
00339    m_incPrec = false;
00340 
00341    /* Information on a stream. The arrays {m_cg, m_bg, m_ig} contain the current
00342    state of the stream, the starting state of the current SubStream, and the
00343    starting state of the stream. This stream generates antithetic variates
00344    if m_anti = true. It also generates numbers with extended precision (53
00345    bits if machine follows IEEE 754 standard) if m_incPrec = true. sm_nextSeed
00346    will be the seed of the next declared RngStream. */
00347 
00348    for (int i = 0; i < 6; ++i) {
00349       m_bg[i] = m_cg[i] = m_ig[i] = sm_nextSeed[i];
00350    }
00351 
00352    MatVecModM (A1p127, sm_nextSeed, sm_nextSeed, m1);
00353    MatVecModM (A2p127, &sm_nextSeed[3], &sm_nextSeed[3], m2);
00354 }
00355 
00356 
00357 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00358 // Reset Stream to beginning of Stream.
00359 //
00360 void RngStream::ResetStartStream ()
00361 {
00362    for (int i = 0; i < 6; ++i)
00363       m_cg[i] = m_bg[i] = m_ig[i];
00364 }
00365 
00366 
00367 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00368 // Reset Stream to beginning of SubStream.
00369 //
00370 void RngStream::ResetStartSubstream ()
00371 {
00372    for (int i = 0; i < 6; ++i)
00373       m_cg[i] = m_bg[i];
00374 }
00375 
00376 
00377 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00378 // Reset Stream to NextSubStream.
00379 //
00380 void RngStream::ResetNextSubstream ()
00381 {
00382    MatVecModM(A1p76, m_bg, m_bg, m1);
00383    MatVecModM(A2p76, &m_bg[3], &m_bg[3], m2);
00384    for (int i = 0; i < 6; ++i)
00385        m_cg[i] = m_bg[i];
00386 }

00389 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00390 bool RngStream::SetPackageSeed (const unsigned long seed[6])
00391 {
00392    if (CheckSeed (seed))
00393       return false;                   // FAILURE     
00394    for (int i = 0; i < 6; ++i)
00395       sm_nextSeed[i] = seed[i];
00396    return true;                       // SUCCESS
00397 }
00398 
00399 
00400 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00401 bool RngStream::SetSeed (const unsigned long seed[6])
00402 {
00403    if (CheckSeed (seed))
00404       return false;                   // FAILURE     
00405    for (int i = 0; i < 6; ++i)
00406       m_cg[i] = m_bg[i] = m_ig[i] = seed[i];
00407    return true;                       // SUCCESS
00408 }

00410 
00411 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00412 // if e > 0, let n = 2^e + c;
00413 // if e < 0, let n = -2^(-e) + c;
00414 // if e = 0, let n = c.
00415 // Jump n steps forward if n > 0, backwards if n < 0.
00416 //
00417 void RngStream::AdvanceState (long e, long c)
00418 {
00419     double B1[3][3], C1[3][3], B2[3][3], C2[3][3];
00420 
00421     if (e > 0) {
00422         MatTwoPowModM (A1p0, B1, m1, e);
00423         MatTwoPowModM (A2p0, B2, m2, e);
00424     } else if (e < 0) {
00425         MatTwoPowModM (InvA1, B1, m1, -e);
00426         MatTwoPowModM (InvA2, B2, m2, -e);
00427     }
00428 
00429     if (c >= 0) {
00430         MatPowModM (A1p0, C1, m1, c);
00431         MatPowModM (A2p0, C2, m2, c);
00432     } else {
00433         MatPowModM (InvA1, C1, m1, -c);
00434         MatPowModM (InvA2, C2, m2, -c);
00435     }
00436 
00437     if (e) {
00438         MatMatModM (B1, C1, C1, m1);
00439         MatMatModM (B2, C2, C2, m2);
00440     }
00441 
00442     MatVecModM (C1, m_cg, m_cg, m1);
00443     MatVecModM (C2, &m_cg[3], &m_cg[3], m2);
00444 }
00445

00447 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00448 void RngStream::GetState (unsigned long seed[6]) const
00449 {
00450    for (int i = 0; i < 6; ++i)
00451       seed[i] = static_cast<unsigned long> (m_cg[i]);
00452 }

00455 void RngStream::IncreasedPrecis (bool incp)
00456 {
00457    m_incPrec = incp;
00458 }

00462 void RngStream::SetAntithetic (bool a)
00463 {
00464    m_anti = a;
00465 }

00468 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00469 // Generate the next random number.
00470 //
00471 double RngStream::RandU01 ()
00472 {
00473    if (m_incPrec)
00474       return U01d();
00475    else
00476       return U01();
00477 }

00480 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00481 // Generate the next random integer.
00482 //
00483 int RngStream::RandInt (int low, int high)
00484 {
00485     return low + static_cast<int> ((high - low + 1.0) * RandU01 ());
00486 };
